text.section: Once an application is accepted, the applicant and the cabinet shall enter into an agreed order which shall set forth the mutual responsibilities of the parties with respect to the remediation project.
If the applicant and the cabinet are unable to negotiate an agreement in good faith within a reasonable time after negotiations have commenced, either party may withdraw from further negotiations.

law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 5, effective June 21, 2001.
